name: Iris Consulting Group
goal: Iris Consulting Group was established in Poland in 2011, is consulting company with specialization in Legal PR, GR, research program in European democracy, Racism and Xenophobia studies areas.
interests: Culture and media, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Modern policy in fight to Racism and Anti-Semitism, development relationship EU and Israel, relationship Poland and EU
